Token.Abstract: TMDiskCache is a thread safe key/value store backed by the file system. It accepts any object conforming to the NSCoding protocol, which includes the basic Foundation data types and collection classes and also many UIKit classes, notably UIImage. All work is performed on a serial queue shared by all instances in the app, and archiving is handled by NSKeyedArchiver. This is a particular advantage for UIImage because it skips UIImagePNGRepresentation() and retains information like scale and orientation.
The name of this cache, used to create a directory under Library/Caches and also appearing in stack traces.
The name of this cache, used to create a directory under Library/Caches and also appearing in stack traces.
The URL of the directory used by this cache, usually Library/Caches/com.tumblr.TMDiskCache.(name)
The URL of the directory used by this cache, usually Library/Caches/com.tumblr.TMDiskCache.(name)
The total number of bytes used on disk, as reported by NSURLTotalFileAllocatedSizeKey.
The total number of bytes used on disk, as reported by NSURLTotalFileAllocatedSizeKey.

The maximum number of bytes allowed on disk. This value is checked every time an object is set, if the written size exceeds the limit a trim call is queued. Defaults to 0.0, meaning no practical limit.

The maximum number of bytes allowed on disk. This value is checked every time an object is set, if the written size exceeds the limit a trim call is queued. Defaults to 0.0, meaning no practical limit.

The maximum number of seconds an object is allowed to exist in the cache. Setting this to a value greater than 0.0 will start a recurring GCD timer with the same period that calls trimToDate:. Setting it back to 0.0 will stop the timer. Defaults to 0.0, meaning no limit.

The maximum number of seconds an object is allowed to exist in the cache. Setting this to a value greater than 0.0 will start a recurring GCD timer with the same period that calls trimToDate:. Setting it back to 0.0 will stop the timer. Defaults to 0.0, meaning no limit.
A block to be executed just before an object is added to the cache. The queue waits during execution.
A block to be executed just before an object is added to the cache. The queue waits during execution.
A block to be executed just before an object is removed from the cache. The queue waits during execution.
A block to be executed just before an object is removed from the cache. The queue waits during execution.
A block to be executed just before all objects are removed from the cache as a result of removeAllObjects:. The queue waits during execution.
A block to be executed just before all objects are removed from the cache as a result of removeAllObjects:. The queue waits during execution.
A block to be executed just after an object is added to the cache. The queue waits during execution.
A block to be executed just after an object is added to the cache. The queue waits during execution.
A block to be executed just after an object is removed from the cache. The queue waits during execution.
A block to be executed just after an object is removed from the cache. The queue waits during execution.
A block to be executed just after all objects are removed from the cache as a result of removeAllObjects:. The queue waits during execution.
A block to be executed just after all objects are removed from the cache as a result of removeAllObjects:. The queue waits during execution.
A shared cache.
A shared serial queue, used by all instances of this class. Use dispatchsettarget_queue to integrate this queue with an exisiting serial I/O queue.
The designated initializer. Multiple instances with the same name are allowed and can safely access the same data on disk thanks to the magic of seriality.

Parameter.Name: name
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the cache.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new cache with the specified name.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves the object for the specified key. This method returns immediately and executes the passed block as soon as the object is available on the serial sharedQueue.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: The key associated with the requested object.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block to be executed serially when the object is available.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves the fileURL for the specified key without actually reading the data from disk. This method returns immediately and executes the passed block as soon as the object is available on the serial sharedQueue.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: The key associated with the requested object.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block to be executed serially when the file URL is available.

Token.Abstract: Stores an object in the cache for the specified key. This method returns immediately and executes the passed block as soon as the object has been stored.

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: An object to store in the cache.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: A key to associate with the object. This string will be copied.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block to be executed serially after the object has been stored, or nil.

Token.Abstract: Removes the object for the specified key. This method returns immediately and executes the passed block as soon as the object has been removed.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: The key associated with the object to be removed.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block to be executed serially after the object has been removed, or nil.

Token.Abstract: Removes all objects from the cache that have not been used since the specified date. This method returns immediately and executes the passed block as soon as the cache has been trimmed.

Parameter.Name: date
Parameter.Abstract: Objects that haven't been accessed since this date are removed from the cache.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block to be executed serially after the cache has been trimmed, or nil.

Token.Abstract: Removes objects from the cache, largest first, until the cache is equal to or smaller than the specified byteCount. This method returns immediately and executes the passed block as soon as the cache has been trimmed.

Parameter.Name: byteCount
Parameter.Abstract: The cache will be trimmed equal to or smaller than this size.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block to be executed serially after the cache has been trimmed, or nil.

Token.Abstract: Removes objects from the cache, ordered by date (least recently used first), until the cache is equal to or smaller than the specified byteCount. This method returns immediately and executes the passed block as soon as the cache has been trimmed.

Parameter.Name: byteCount
Parameter.Abstract: The cache will be trimmed equal to or smaller than this size.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block to be executed serially after the cache has been trimmed, or nil.

Token.Abstract: Removes all objects from the cache. This method returns immediately and executes the passed block as soon as the cache has been cleared.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block to be executed serially after the cache has been cleared, or nil.

Token.Abstract: Loops through all objects in the cache (reads and writes are suspended during the enumeration). Data is not actually read from disk, the object parameter of the block will be nil but the fileURL will be available. This method returns immediately.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block to be executed for every object in the cache.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: An optional block to be executed after the enumeration is complete.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves the object for the specified key. This method blocks the calling thread until the object is available.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: The key associated with the object.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The object for the specified key.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves the file URL for the specified key. This method blocks the calling thread until the url is available. Do not use this URL anywhere but on the sharedQueue. This method probably shouldn't even exist, just use the asynchronous one.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: The key associated with the object.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The file URL for the specified key.

Token.Abstract: Stores an object in the cache for the specified key. This method blocks the calling thread until the object has been stored.

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: An object to store in the cache.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: A key to associate with the object. This string will be copied.

Token.Abstract: Removes the object for the specified key. This method blocks the calling thread until the object has been removed.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: The key associated with the object to be removed.

Token.Abstract: Removes all objects from the cache that have not been used since the specified date. This method blocks the calling thread until the cache has been trimmed.

Parameter.Name: date
Parameter.Abstract: Objects that haven't been accessed since this date are removed from the cache.

Token.Abstract: Removes objects from the cache, largest first, until the cache is equal to or smaller than the specified byteCount. This method blocks the calling thread until the cache has been trimmed.

Parameter.Name: byteCount
Parameter.Abstract: The cache will be trimmed equal to or smaller than this size.

Token.Abstract: Removes objects from the cache, ordered by date (least recently used first), until the cache is equal to or smaller than the specified byteCount. This method blocks the calling thread until the cache has been trimmed.

Parameter.Name: byteCount
Parameter.Abstract: The cache will be trimmed equal to or smaller than this size.

Token.Abstract: Removes all objects from the cache. This method blocks the calling thread until the cache has been cleared.

Loops through all objects in the cache (reads and writes are suspended during the enumeration). Data is not actually read from disk, the object parameter of the block will be nil but the fileURL will be available. This method blocks the calling thread until all objects have been enumerated.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block to be executed for every object in the cache.
